notification.pasted_new_wand: Pasted as new wand from clipboard (Slot {{slot}})
notification.pushed_to_game: Pushed {{count}} wands from current workflow to game

tabs.waiting_data: Waiting for data sync or add a wand to this workflow...
tabs.clear_history_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all history? (Cannot be undone)

evaluator.force_analyze_desc: Restart engine and re-evaluate current wand (Fixes lag or sync issues)

settings.title: Settings
settings.warehouse_folder_height_desc: * Set to 0 for unlimited folder height
settings.hide_labels_desc: Hide 'Common Statistics' and category names in the spell picker for a more compact interface.
settings.show_stats_in_frames_desc: Show cast delay and recharge time in frames (1/60s) instead of seconds.
settings.show_legacy_wand_button_desc: Show a 'W' button on wand cards to copy in the old {{Wand}} template format for the Wiki.
settings.delete_empty_slots_desc: When pressing Delete, if the slot is already empty, directly remove the slot (reduce capacity).
settings.unlimited_spells_desc: Simulate having the 'Unlimited Spells' perk. Note: Black Hole, Healing Bolt, etc., still have limited charges. (Due to a current bug, you must Alt+Left Click to set charges for these non-unlimited spells regardless of this setting)
settings.initial_if_half_desc: When enabled, the first cast will not skip spells after IF_HALF; when disabled, it will skip. (New games default to not skipping on the first use)
settings.simulate_low_hp_desc: Used for IF_HP; simulates the condition where HP is less than 25%.
settings.simulate_many_enemies_desc: Used for IF_ENEMY; simulates more than 15 enemies nearby.
settings.simulate_many_projectiles_desc: Used for IF_PROJECTILE; simulates more than 20 projectiles nearby.
settings.show_spell_charges_desc: Show usage counts in the editor. Set to 0 to always show. (Note: Evaluation does not deduct charges; it only considers unlimited or 0 charges)
settings.num_casts_desc: Simulates multiple clicks; mana consumption may cause different results per round.
settings.auto_hide_threshold_desc: If the complexity of the first Cast exceeds this node count, subsequent Casts will be folded by default.
settings.group_identical_casts_desc: Merge consecutive casts with identical results to simplify the list.
settings.fold_nodes_desc: Merge consecutive identical nodes in the tree (e.g., x5). Disable this to see each individual spell, making marking easier.
settings.show_indices_desc: Display the index number (1, 2, 3...) at the bottom right of each spell slot. Holding ALT will temporarily show them even if disabled.
settings.export_history_desc: Save undo/redo history along with the workflow data.
settings.embed_metadata_desc: When exporting an image, embed the Wand2 text data into the PNG. Others can drag the image into Wand2H to restore the wand.

warehouse.title: Wand Warehouse
warehouse.delete_wand_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this wand?
warehouse.delete_folder_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this folder? (Wands inside will move to root)
warehouse.no_smart_tags: No smart tags yet, click button above to create
warehouse.search_spells: Search and click to add spells...
warehouse.backup_detected:
Backup file detected.
Contains {{wandCount}} wands, {{folderCount}} folders.

Merge into current warehouse? (Click 'Cancel' to overwrite current warehouse)

conflict.title: Sync Conflict Detected
conflict.description: You modified wands on the web while offline, and game data also changed. Please choose how to proceed:
conflict.use_web_desc: Forcibly sync your current edits to the game
conflict.use_game_desc: Discard your recent web edits and pull the latest game state
conflict.use_both_desc: Keep web edits and save game data as a new tab

shortcuts.copy_paste: Copy, paste, or cut selected spells
shortcuts.select_all: Select all spells in the current wand
shortcuts.insert_slot: Insert an empty slot at the selection
shortcuts.remove_slot: Remove slot when pressing on empty (if enabled)
shortcuts.modify_uses: Modify spell charges (set to 0 to simulate drained)

tips.triggered: Red Triangle: Indicates environment simulations (IF_HP, IF_PROJECTILE, IF_ENEMY) are set to triggered (not skipped).
tips.skipped: Grayscale Icon: Indicates the spell is out of charges or was skipped due to conditions.
tips.rounds: The number of evaluation rounds can be adjusted in 'Cast Parameters' (default is 3).
